title: The new champion portraits are a step backwards
body:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/VPBE

someone has just gone into photoshop and dragged the Vibrance and Contrast sliders to max (or clarity slider) and it shows, 
having too much contrast like that makes the image harsher on the eyes and looks overdone.
rumble and malphite can pull it off because of their artwork, but the rest just look overdone
kayle looks just odd, azir is waaaaay too contrasty, cho'gath is too dark, and because of the shadow on alistar's face with that much contrast, you cant even tell what it is, at any real distance.
im not sure why they needed adjustment anyway, they were perfectly recognisable how they were.
but thats just my opinion from someone who studies this stuff.

also i don't like the new Ahri splash but thats just personal.

[EDIT]: Btw I'm only talking about the killstreak head icons, not the new splash arts, most of those are great.

replies.body:
Yeah, I'm really not a fan of the new Ahri splash. There's something about it that's not distinct enough. 


I've also noticed the contrast adjustments. It makes everything so bright and yellow. What is the point of that? The Alistar one just looks like a floating head.

I dont see a reason for the contrast things

and with the ahri splash art its almost the opposite, almost every colour in the picture is of almost the same tonal value which just makes it look flat and uninteresting, also it looks like she is being grabbed by some furry octopus instead of having fox tails, the old splash art dispite having less detail was actually much clearer, the new one shows nothing of her 'seductive charm' from her lore, her facial expression makes it look like she just took ALL the drugs, and thats probably not the look riot should associate with their champ.

Some of them were improvements I think. I always thought Lee Sin's newer icon looked more like an amputated leg with a face painted on it than a head or something. He was just... so... ugly. Argh. :P

I like Ahri's new splash.. but I see what you mean by Alistar's new icon looking like a floating head.

gives easier detailing. easier to see.

if it hurts your eyes, get tested for autism. and cancer. ebola and aids too just to be safe.
